General.Name: Bank Of India Indonesia Tbk
General.Description: PT Bank of India Indonesia Tbk provides commercial banking products and services in Indonesia. The company's deposit products include current accounts, savings accounts, time deposits, and deposits with guarantee from deposit guarantor. It also offers remittances; and credit services, such as overdraft facility, installment credit, house ownership credit, vehicle credit, investment/working capital credit, consumption credit, demand/fixed loan, letter of credit, bank guarantee, credit line for forex cover, corporate credit, and SME credit, as well as export/import financing services. In addition, the company provides foreign currency transactions, such as money market transactions, swaps/forward transactions, bank drafts, and buying and selling foreign currencies. It operates through 7 branch offices, 6 sub-branch offices, and 2 cash offices. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Swadesi Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank of India Indonesia Tbk in November 2011. PT Bank of India Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank of India Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Bank of India.
General.Address: Jalan H. Samanhudi No. 37, Central Jakarta, Indonesia, 10710
